TEXT.TITLE: CHRYSLER <C> TO RUN SIX OF SEVEN U.S. PLANTS
TEXT.BODY: Chrysler Corp said it scheduled six of its seven U.S. car and truck assembly plants to operate the week of March 30, with four on overtime. It also said one plant will operate Saturday, March 28. Reuter
